Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,
I have been playing KSP (1.0.4) for a while now with many mods installed and the game seemed to run without any consequences, however a few days ago it stopped working :( (I haven't changed anything btw). I have looked around the internet but I cannot find any questions relating to the question. Please can someone help me to find out what the issue is!

p.s. I have tried fresh installs but I have had no luck...

Probably Windows removed your graphics driver, it's been doing that a lot lately.

I'll move this to Support, please locate your output_log.txt in the KSP_Data folder, put it on dropbox and post the share link here, thanks.
Do you have KW Rocketry installed?

Ok. I will try and located the file. Hopefully it works...
p.s. I have tried without mods. It does run but it stops after a while.

Okay it looks like it is active texture manager, there's lots of errors in the log relating to it, so please test with ATM removed.

Also you have put KSP in Documents, Windows may prevent it from working properly (prevents KSP writing new files), it's better to unzip a new copy of KSP to a folder such as C:\Games (you make this folder).
YES!!! texture manager was the problem, I removed mine and my game loads fine now! Yay!!!

It works now thanks a lot!

Still a little buggy but it now works!
